column4: I THINK (don't quote me) you could compile it yourself, but thats way over my skill level.

It's possible for the same reason many web hosts aren't using Apache 2.4 yet and are still running 2.2.2; while it's available and stable, it's not "production ready", even though it may seem like it.
I agree.  A couple months?  Sure.  4, pushing it.
